title: The World's Smallest Laptop Just Got Faster
description: With a 7 inch screen and full Windows 10, the GPD Pocket 2 is a surprisingly capable tiny laptop. GPD Pocket 2 on Indiegogo:   Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
